title: [NA] Silver Tournament Team: Elo Complexity: Serious Inquiries:
body:
Team Name : **Team Elo Complexity **
Tournament Website : **[Compete League :: Bronze & Silver League](https://lol.competeleague.com/#/leagues-silver-premier)**
Tournament Stream : **[Compete League Twitch Stream](https://www.twitch.tv/competeleague)**
TLDR; Below is a lot of information about our team and the league we are in. Our application for our team is at the bottom of this page.


**MUST BE ABLE TO MAKE PRACTICE AT 5PM PST M-F**
Prefer DUO Bot lane for better synergy:

FILL OUT THE FORUM TO BE ADDED

Don't add me in game. 


About the League : Compete League is a tournament league open to all divisions of play. We play in the Bronze & Silver League. There is a Premier League and Open League. To play in the Open League, our team needs a complete team of Five players. You can think of the open league as a 'Practice' and 'Scrim' league that you play in before the premier league. The next season for the premier league begins in June. We plan to play in this league. As a team, we will need to play against other teams in the Open League and qualify for a spot in the premier league.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Game Days : Each Monday of the month, between the times of **4:30 PM** to **8:00 PM** Pacific Standard Time (Possibility of later nights based on game length) Game day schedule subject to change based on tournament admins discretion.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**What I am Looking For:**


Be on 5:00 PM PST for Practice.
Able to play at a high caliber competitively.
Willing to accept a try-outs whether they be 1 game or 10.
Able to adapt and adjust play styles to fit the team, composition, and enemy team.
Excel in communication with a team of Four others to achieve positive outcomes on Discord.
Able to provide positive reinforcement and critique for yourself as well as team members in constructive manners.
An open schedule with room to work.
Between the divisions of Bronze 5 and Silver 1.
If you are interested, we ask that you fill out our short Q&A in a post below.

Thank you, 
Fiasivimadoh

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
In-game Name :
Age :
Timezone :
Role :
Solo Queue Division :
Discord Communication Application & Microphone Accessible (Y/N) :
List; Your Top 3 Champions for Role Applying :
Briefly describe your play style :
Your strongest attributes :
Your weakest attributes :
Why you would like to be apart of a tournament team :
Your past experience on a tournament style team or ranked team (If Applicable) :
The best time to reach you in-game :

replies.body:
In-game Name : Colossify
Age : 16 
Timezone : CST
Role : Top
Solo Queue Division : Silver V
Discord Communication Application & Microphone Accessible (Y/N) : yes
List; Your Top 3 Champions for Role Applying : Renekton Swain Irelia
Briefly describe your play style : Aggrressive Teamfighter Objective pusher
Your strongest attributes : good laning pressence, decent warding, adaptability, decent early game tp usage.(Coming From a old coach)
Your weakest attributes : bad vision control mid-late game split pushing, no wave control, not to talkative in losing situations, negative chatter after making bad plays (such as expressing you're tilted.)(Coming From a old coach)
Why you would like to be apart of a tournament team :Of course I love competition I use to be a pro level halo player
Your past experience on a tournament style team or ranked team (If Applicable) :I played in tmg league and played in a single elimination tourneys in teamspeak
The best time to reach you in-game : 1pm-1-4am

In-game Name : Yung Baker

Solo Queue Division : Silver 4

Did i just get ignored lol

In-game Name : Mata LoL
Age : 24
Timezone : Central
Role : Mid
Solo Queue Division : Silver 4
Discord Communication Application & Microphone Accessible (Y/N) : Yes
List; Your Top 3 Champions for Role Applying : Ekko Kha Zix and Zed
Briefly describe your play style : Hit 2 before they do if i do they i go in and back off unless they are at a hp where i can kill them but mostyl try to win lane first before i roam and im great at team fights 
Your strongest attributes : Team Fights positioning myself knowing when we can win a fight and when we cannot im a great shotcaller
Your weakest attributes : I need great simple communication for me to do my best but in solo que i still do fine i just need to make sure that everyone is on the same page . When we are not i tend to be in risky situations that could lead to my death.
Why you would like to be apart of a tournament team : i love to do tournaments im getting coached by a good friend of mine that also does tournaments .
Your past experience on a tournament style team or ranked team (If Applicable) :  was doing well at first till they started to not show up or not be as serious as i hoped for im a loyal player looking for a dedicated long term team .
The best time to reach you in-game : I will be on at 1pm central - 2pm central around that time i will be on then ill get off depending if any1 isnt on . oky

Sorry Mata Looking for people who actually main their roles. (They actually play the role they are wanting in ranked) Looks like you hardly ever play mid.

In-game Name : Dem PLAYz MONICA
Age : 21
Timezone : Mountain
Role : Jungle / ADC
Solo Queue Division : S2 Currently.
Discord Communication Application & Microphone Accessible (Y/N) : Y
List; Your Top 3 Champions for Role Applying : Jungle = Kindred/Reks/Lee  ADC = Ez/twitch/Lucian 
Briefly describe your play style : Timely aggression
Your strongest attributes : In game? Vision, objective control (timely ganking) Counter jungling, Win condition adaptation.
Your weakest attributes : Still working on jungle pathing with some champions. Working on my cs at 15
Why you would like to be apart of a tournament team : Because i have a passion for competitive LoL
Your past experience on a tournament style team or ranked team (If Applicable) : Plenty of previous tournament experience. Both local (colorado) and a bigger tournament in florida. . Played on many different teams, none end up being as serious as id like. So I'm still looking for the right home as i progress in competitive play.
The best time to reach you in-game : Any time I am on. But im normally on around 6pm my time. I own my own business so i can somewhat build a schedule around a team.

Hey bud, Sadly you were gold last season and you wouldn't be eligible to join the Bronze/Silver league. You are required to either be non ranked or Silver last season (This is to prevent anyone from smurfing).
